decision_conditions: The amendments to the host building shall be constructed as per the details set out in the approved plans. These amendments shall be completed to the Council's satisfaction within six (6) months of the date of this permission, otherwise planning permission will lapse.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4, and D14 of the London Plan (2021); and 7A, 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site Location Plan; MA24/CC/00 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/01 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/03 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/03 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/04 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/06 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/07 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/08 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/09 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/10 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/04 Rev. 00; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 00; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 01; MA24/CC/05 Rev. 01.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey side/rear extension (following partial demolition of existing side/rear addition); conversion of front garage into habitable room including insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door opening; installation of one rooflight to front roof slope and removal of chimney stack to main rear roof slope; alteration to external elevations (part retrospective).
